about_the_game:
Tired of using your inner voice to read? Are you blind like me? Try the new AI Narration DLC for The Bible! It's totally free, and it allows you to get high quality human-like narration for your preferred translation of The Bible.

This DLC utilises the amazing Bark TTS library from Suno to bring you AI-generated narration, running locally on your own PC! If this isn't your thing, you can try the ElevenLabs integration in the base game.

Included is our own custom Narrator voice, Isaiah! With many other voices to choose from.

Please note the AI sometimes acts with a spirit of drunkenness and becomes unintelligible, you may re-generate a chapter if it starts misbehaving.
